description.english: Your heart is void of worldly desires for coins and tickets
description.german: Dein Herz ist frei von weltlichen Begierden nach Münzen und Tickets
description.italian: Il tuo cuore è vuoto di desideri mondani per monete e biglietti
description.koreana: 당신의 마음속엔 이미 코인과 티켓에 대한 세속적 욕망이 없습니다
description.schinese: 你的心中，已经没有了对金币和彩票的世俗欲望
description.tchinese: 你的心中，已經沒有了對金幣和彩票的世俗慾望
description.japanese: あなたの心には、もはやコインやチケットへの世俗的な欲望はありません
description.russian: В вашем сердце больше нет мирских желаний монет и билетов
description.latam: Tu corazón está vacío de deseos mundanos por monedas y boletos

description.english: Trigger Coin Rain during Zen Meditation

description.russian: Вызовите дождь из монет во время Дзен-медитации

description.english: Play Cyber Pusher, knock Cyber Wooden Fish, chant Cyber Sutras, win Cyber Life
description.german: Spiele Cyber-Pusher, schlage den Cyber-Holzfisch, rezitiere Cyber-Sutras, gewinne das Cyber-Leben
description.italian: Gioca a Cyber Pusher, batti il Pesce di Legno Cyber, recita Cyber Sutra, vinci la Cyber Vita
description.koreana: 사이버 코인 푸셔를 하고, 사이버 목탁을 두드리고, 사이버 불경을 외우며, 사이버 인생을 승리하세요
description.schinese: 玩赛博推币，敲赛博木鱼，诵赛博真经，赢赛博人生
description.tchinese: 玩賽博推幣，敲賽博木魚，誦賽博真經，贏賽博人生
description.japanese: サイバーコイン落としを遊び、サイバー木魚を叩き、サイバー経を唱え、サイバー人生を勝つ
description.russian: Играйте в кибер-пушер, бейте в кибер-рыбу, читайте кибер-сутры, выиграйте кибер-жизнь
description.latam: Juega Ciber-Pusher, golpea el Pez de Madera Ciber, recita Ciber-Sutras, gana la Ciber-Vida

description.english: Jade must be cut to become a vessel

description.italian: La giada deve essere tagliata per diventare un vaso
description.koreana: 옥은 다듬지 않으면 그릇이 되지 않는다
description.japanese: 玉は磨かざれば器とならず
description.russian: Нефрит должен быть огранен, чтобы стать сосудом
description.latam: El jade debe ser tallado para convertirse en vasija

description.english: Experts and frauds alike, I have seen them all
description.german: Experten und Betrüger gleichermaßen, ich habe sie alle gesehen
description.italian: Esperti e truffatori allo stesso modo, li ho visti tutti
description.schinese: 无论是行家还是骗子，我都见识过了
description.tchinese: 無論是行家還是騙子，我都見識過了
description.japanese: 専門家も詐欺師も、私はすべて見てきた
description.russian: Я видел всех: и экспертов, и мошенников
description.latam: Expertos y fraudes por igual, los he visto a todos

description.english: This stroke determined the destiny of this treasure
description.german: Dieser Strich bestimmte das Schicksal dieses Schatzes

description.koreana: 이 한 획이 이 보물의 천명을 정했다
description.schinese: 这一笔，定下了此宝的天命
description.tchinese: 這一筆，定下了此寶的天命
description.japanese: この一筆が、この宝の天命を定めた

description.english: Walk often by the river, and your shoes will get wet
description.german: Wer oft am Fluss spaziert, bekommt nasse Schuhe
description.italian: Cammina spesso vicino al fiume e ti bagnerai le scarpe
description.koreana: 물가에 자주 가면 신발이 젖기 마련이다
description.schinese: 常在河边走，哪有不湿鞋
description.tchinese: 常在河邊走，哪有不濕鞋
description.japanese: 川辺を歩けば、靴は濡れるもの
description.russian: Кто часто ходит у реки, тот промочит ноги

description.english: When Asura rages, the world changes color
description.german: Wenn Asura tobt, ändert die Welt ihre Farbe
description.italian: Quando Asura si infuria, il mondo cambia colore
description.schinese: 修罗一怒，天地为之变色
description.tchinese: 修羅一怒，天地為之變色
description.japanese: 修羅が怒れば、天地の色が変わる
description.russian: Когда Асура в ярости, мир меняет цвет
description.latam: Cuando Asura se enfurece, el mundo cambia de color

description.english: Repeating the path, returning in seven days, this is the way of heaven
description.german: Den Pfad wiederholen, in sieben Tagen zurückkehren, dies ist der Weg des Himmels
description.italian: Ripetere il percorso, ritornare in sette giorni, questa è la via del cielo
description.koreana: 그 도를 반복하여 7일 만에 돌아오니, 이것이 하늘의 운행이다
description.schinese: 反复其道，七日来复，天行也
description.tchinese: 反覆其道，七日來復，天行也
description.japanese: その道を繰り返し、七日にして復る、これ天行なり
description.russian: Повторять путь, возвращаться через семь дней — таков небесный закон
description.latam: Repetir el camino, regresar en siete días, este es el camino del cielo

description.english: Identify 3 results at once via the Master

description.tchinese: 通過大師一次鑑出3種結果

description.english: Scattered gold and silver can build a nine-story tower
description.german: Verstreutes Gold und Silber kann einen neunstöckigen Turm bauen
description.italian: Oro e argento sparsi possono costruire una torre di nove piani
description.koreana: 흩어진 금과 은으로 9층 탑을 쌓을 수 있다
description.schinese: 散金碎银，亦可筑九层之台
description.tchinese: 散金碎銀，亦可築九層之台
description.japanese: 散らばった金銀も、積もれば九層の台となる
description.russian: Рассыпанное золото и серебро могут построить девятиэтажную башню
description.latam: Oro y plata esparcidos pueden construir una torre de nueve pisos

description.english: Golden light shines, twin peaks stand together
description.german: Goldenes Licht scheint, Zwillingsgipfel stehen zusammen
description.italian: La luce dorata risplende, cime gemelle stanno insieme
description.japanese: 金色の光が輝き、双峰が並び立つ
description.russian: Золотой свет сияет, пики-близнецы стоят вместе
description.latam: Luz dorada brilla, picos gemelos se alzan juntos

description.english: Turning mortal gold into immortal jade, truly a work of gods
description.german: Sterbliches Gold in unsterbliche Jade verwandeln, wahrlich ein Werk der Götter
description.italian: Trasformare l'oro mortale in giada immortale, veramente un'opera degli dei
description.koreana: 평범한 금을 불멸의 옥으로 바꾸니, 실로 신의 솜씨로다
description.schinese: 化凡金为仙玉，是为鬼斧神工
description.tchinese: 化凡金為仙玉，是為鬼斧神工
description.japanese: 凡庸な金を不滅の玉に変える、まさに神の御業
description.russian: Превращение смертного золота в бессмертный нефрит, поистине работа богов
description.latam: Convertir oro mortal en jade inmortal, verdaderamente una obra de dioses

description.english: A scene belonging to heaven, rarely heard of on earth
description.german: Eine Szene, die dem Himmel gehört, selten auf Erden gehört
description.italian: Una scena che appartiene al cielo, raramente udita sulla terra
description.koreana: 천상에나 있을 법한 풍경, 인간 세상에선 듣기 힘들구나
description.schinese: 此景只应天上有，人间哪得几回闻？
description.tchinese: 此景只應天上有，人間哪得幾回聞？
description.japanese: 天上にあるべき風景、人間界では稀に見る
description.russian: Сцена, принадлежащая небесам, редко встречающаяся на земле
description.latam: Una escena que pertenece al cielo, rara vez escuchada en la tierra

description.english: To see a thousand miles further, ascend another flight of stairs
description.german: Um tausend Meilen weiter zu sehen, steige eine weitere Treppe hinauf
description.italian: Per vedere mille miglia più lontano, sali un'altra rampa di scale
description.koreana: 천 리 밖을 더 보고 싶어, 한 층을 더 오르네
description.schinese: 欲穷千里目，更上一层楼
description.tchinese: 欲窮千里目，更上一層樓
description.japanese: 千里の先を見るために、さらなる高みへ登る
description.russian: Чтобы видеть на тысячу миль дальше, поднимитесь еще на один пролет лестницы
description.latam: Para ver mil millas más lejos, sube otro tramo de escaleras

description.english: Before absolute power, even towering structures are but dust
description.german: Vor absoluter Macht sind selbst hoch aufragende Strukturen nur Staub
description.italian: Di fronte al potere assoluto, anche le strutture imponenti sono solo polvere
description.koreana: 절대적인 힘 앞에서는 높은 건물도 먼지와 같다
description.schinese: 在绝对的力量面前，万丈高楼亦如尘埃
description.tchinese: 在絕對的力量面前，萬丈高樓亦如塵埃
description.japanese: 絶対的な力の前には、高層ビルも塵に等しい
description.russian: Перед абсолютной властью даже высокие сооружения — лишь пыль
description.latam: Ante el poder absoluto, incluso las estructuras imponentes son solo polvo

description.english: You have thoroughly comprehended the "Cosmic Record"
description.german: Du hast das „Kosmische Protokoll“ vollständig durchdrungen
description.italian: Hai compreso a fondo il "Registro Cosmico"
description.schinese: 这本《乾坤秘录》，已被你参悟得透彻淋漓。
description.tchinese: 這本《乾坤秘錄》，已被你參悟得透徹淋漓
description.japanese: この『乾坤秘録』を、あなたは徹底的に悟り尽くした
description.latam: Has comprendido a fondo el "Registro Cósmico"

description.english: Wash away the past, rebuild your destiny
description.german: Den Glanz abwaschen, die Schöpfung neu formen
description.italian: Lava via il passato, riforgia il destino
description.japanese: 鉛華を洗い流し、造化を修め直す
description.latam: Lava el pasado, reconstruye tu destino

description.english: Max out the Xuanwu skill tree
description.italian: Massimizza l'albero delle abilità di Xuanwu
description.japanese: 玄武系統のスキルを最大まで強化
description.latam: Maximiza el árbol de habilidades de Xuanwu

displayName.italian: Il Drago Azzurro Cavalca i Cieli
displayName.latam: El Dragón Azur Surca los Cielos

description.english: Max out the Azure Dragon skill tree
description.italian: Massimizza l'albero delle abilità del Drago Azzurro
description.japanese: 青龍系統のスキルを最大まで強化
description.latam: Maximiza el árbol de habilidades del Dragón Azur

displayName.italian: La Tigre Bianca Custodisce la Ricchezza
displayName.latam: El Tigre Blanco Guarda la Riqueza

description.english: Max out the White Tiger skill tree
description.italian: Massimizza l'albero delle abilità della Tigre Bianca
description.japanese: 白虎系統のスキルを最大まで強化
description.latam: Maximiza el árbol de habilidades del Tigre Blanco

displayName.latam: El Pájaro Bermellón Quema el Cielo

description.english: Max out the Vermilion Bird skill tree
description.italian: Massimizza l'albero delle abilità dell'Uccello Vermiglio
description.japanese: 朱雀系統のスキルを最大まで強化
description.latam: Maximiza el árbol de habilidades del Pájaro Bermellón

description.english: Trigger the "Lost Pearl of the Ocean" event.
description.german: Löse das Ereignis „Verlorene Perle des Ozeans“ aus.
description.italian: Attiva l'evento "Perla Perduta dell'Oceano".
description.japanese: 「滄海遺珠」イベントを出す
description.latam: Activa el evento "Perla Perdida del Océano"

description.english: Break open the Shattered Shell in "Lost Pearl of the Ocean".
description.german: Brich die zerbrochene Muschel in „Verlorene Perle des Ozeans“ auf.
description.italian: Rompi il Guscio Infranto in "Perla Perduta dell'Oceano".
description.schinese: 于沧海遗珠中击开砗磲
description.tchinese: 於滄海遺珠中擊開碎磲
description.russian: Разбейте Расколотую раковину в событии «Жемчужина бездны»
description.japanese: 「滄海遺珠」で砕磲（さいきょ）を撃ち開ける
description.latam: Rompe la Concha Fragmentada en "Perla Perdida del Océano"
